iranamadu haraha kilinochchiya saha yapanayata jalaya labadimata amerikan dolar miliyana 157k wen karala kolambaa nagarayata passe athi wena wishalathama jala yojana kramaya uthuru palathe, yapanaye saha kilinochchiye janathawa wenuwen idi karanna katayuthu karala thibenawa.wasara 2006 di widulibalaya laba ganipu pawul 37,97,977yi hitiye. 2011 wasare 9 wani masaye 30 wanida wena kota eya 51,45,284 dakwa wadi karala - aluthin widuliya dila - kuppi lampuwen eliya balapu janatha pawul 13,47,307ka daruwanta ada widuli bubulen padam karanna puluwan hakiyawa labila thibenawa. 2012 wasara awasan wenakota me siyalu denatama widuliya laba denna athigaru janadhipathithuma mewara aya wayen prathipadana wen kara thibenawa.
